lead_paragraph: SOLINGER--Hope Gimbel, (born November 29th, 1914) died peacefully at home on Sunday, March 6th at age 101. Hope was a beloved mother, daughter, grandmother, aunt, great-aunt and sister. For many years she was a devoted volunteer at and contributor to The Lighthouse for the Blind in New York City, and was proud of the work The Lighthouse did to better the lives of those in need. Hope is survived by her daughters, Faith Sommerfield and Lynn Stern; her grandchildren, Emily Kunschner, Peter Sommerfield and Nicholas Stern; her five great-grandchildren; and her dear friend and longtime caregiver, Myrna Ganzon. There will be no public service. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  SOLINGER, HOPE GIMBEL
